publish.title: Publish Service
publish.description.template:
[Write the description of the service here]

FEATURES

  • [Write the features of the service here]
  • [Write the features of the service here]
  • [Write the features of the service here]

BENEFITS

  • [Write the benefits of the service here]
  • [Write the benefits of the service here]
  • [Write the benefits of the service here]

SUPPORT

  • [Write the support conditions of the service here]

CONTACT

  • [Write your name here]
  • [Write your phone number here]
  • [Write your e-mail here]

name.minlength: The name is required to be at least 1 character.

toscaname.required: The Service TOSCA Name is required.
toscaname.minlength: The Service TOSCA Name is required to be at least 1 character.
toscaname.maxlength: The Service TOSCA Name cannot be longer than 10 characters.
toscaname.pattern: The Service TOSCA Name cannot contain spaces.

description.minlength: The description is required to be at least 1 character.

termsAndConditions.required: The terms and conditions link is required.

applicationSubscriberMail.required: The subscriber mail template is required.

applicationSpMail.required: The provider mail template is required.
